articles.description: AC Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic scored two goals against ten-man Napoli in Serie A, which led to Jasprit Bumrah showering praise on the forward.
articles.content: Zlatan Ibrahimovic never seems to be getting old! The 39-year-old, who is currently with AC Milan, helped the Italians to their first Serie A win vs Napoli in ten years on Monday. He scored a brace i… [+1351 chars]

articles.title: Fakhar Zaman ruled out of New Zealand tour - International Cricket Council
articles.description: Pakistan batsman Fakhar Zaman has been ruled out of the New Zealand tour with a fever.
articles.content:
